name: gistory
description: A Three.js-based tool for viewing a repository's commit history as a 3D graph.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:scripts & npm run clean:styles
scripts.build: npm run build:styles && npm run build:scripts
scripts.build:scripts: npm run clean:scripts && npm run lint:scripts && npm run transform:scripts && npx webpack --mode=development
scripts.build:styles: npm run clean:styles && npm run lint:styles && npm run transform:styles
scripts.transform:styles: npx mkdirp dist/styles && cp -r src/styles/*.css dist/styles
